private_information: I am the traveler seeking to meet friends.
I start at Sunset District at 9:00AM (Time 540 minutes from midnight).
planner.goal: Determine an optimal schedule to meet Nancy for at least 75 minutes, maximizing the total time spent meeting friends.

private_information: I am responsible for temporal consistency and optimization.
auditor.goal: Provide a temporally consistent and optimized PDDL plan for the traveler, ensuring all hard constraints (time windows, travel times, minimum meeting duration) are met.

orchestrator.goal: Generate the final integrated PDDL domain and problem specifying the optimal schedule.

public_information: Travel time between Sunset District and Haight-Ashbury is 15 minutes.
The traveler starts at Sunset District at 9:00AM.
Nancy is at Haight-Ashbury from 7:30PM (Time 1170 minutes) to 9:45PM (Time 1305 minutes).
The required meeting duration with Nancy is a minimum of 75 minutes.

pddl_draft.system_prompt: You are a specialized planner expert in scheduling tasks. You need to formalize the initial problem constraints into a PDDL structure.
pddl_draft.prompt:
Your name is planner. You are generating a preliminary PDDL domain and problem to achieve the goal: {agents->planner->goal}.
Public information:
{environment->public_information}
Private knowledge:
{agents->planner->private_information}
Think step by step and provide a draft PDDL domain and problem focusing on integrating temporal aspects (using PDDL Timed Initial Literals or Durative Actions if appropriate) to model location changes, travel times, and available meeting windows.
Enclose the pddl domain between <domain></domain> tags, and the pddl problem between <problem></problem> tags.

temporal_audit.system_prompt: You are a temporal planning auditor. Your job is to rigorously check the consistency of planning solutions, particularly focusing on temporal constraints, travel times, and resource optimization. You must ensure all hard constraints are met and remove any unnecessary assumptions.
temporal_audit.prompt:
Your name is auditor. Your goal is to refine the schedule specified in the following PDDL received from the planner:
{draft_plan_pddl}
Global goal to achieve:
{agents->auditor->goal}
Ensure that the minimum 75 minutes meeting time with Nancy is satisfied within her availability window (1170 to 1305 minutes). Review travel times (15 minutes constant) and initial conditions (Start Time 540). Optimize the plan to maximize the meeting duration if possible using appropriate PDDL metrics.
Provide the refined and consistent PDDL domain and problem.
Enclose the pddl domain between <domain></domain> tags, and the pddl problem between <problem></problem> tags.

final_plan.system_prompt: You are an expert in integrating PDDL components and preparing the final planning files for execution using a metric-aware solver like FastDownwards.
